bibl.title: Hierakapollon, the Title of Panos Polis and the Names in -apollon. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Onomastic study of theophoric names compounded with -apollon as their second element. Some of them are limited to a particular part of Egypt and illustrate religious particularisms.
bibl.seg: LITINAS Nikos, Hierakapollon, the Title of Panos Polis and the Names in -apollon. Avec résumé en anglais.
Onomastic study of theophoric names compounded with -apollon as their second element. Some of them are limited to a particular part of Egypt and illustrate religious particularisms.
